sourcesContent:
import {Component} from "react"; class Moviecard extends Component{ constructor(){ super(); this.state = { title: "The Avengers", plot: "Supernatural powers shown in the movie", price: "Rs.199", rating: 8.9 } } render() { const {title, plot, price, rating } = this.state; return(
{title}
{plot}
{price}
{rating}
0
) } } export default Moviecard;
